fields.Name: Hellcat
fields.Background: Patricia "Patsy" Walker was a celebrity thanks to her mother's comic book series centered around her, and was living a model life with a husband who she had a crush on since high school, and money without hassle. But thanks to a particularly nasty divorce, she decided that her passion resided elsewhere from the typical household life, and with assistance from Beast scoured the streets as the crime-fighting vigilante known as Hellcat
fields.Strengths: Superhuman Physical Characteristics, Acrobatics, Martial Arts, Vehicular Mastery, Extrasensory Perception, Telekinesis and Cloth Manipulation for her costume. Resistance to Mind Manipulation, Illusion Creation and Magic Attack Potency: Small Building level (Has the same source of strength as the Cat. Shown to be on par with Daredevil), Solar System level with Psychokinetic Blasts (Knocks out characters such as the Blob and Hercules) Speed: Massively Hypersonic+ (Comparable to Tigra and Daredevil)
fields.Weaknesses: She cannot consciously control her mental powers, which only activate in near-death scenarios outside of her control. Extensive use of them will give her a mild migraine.
